(For all posts involving the Ark)

Lunarpine follows Ramhorn and Striker out of the Ark with his rifle 
drawn, he smelled the air and reported to the others,"I got three 
scents, this should be over in no time."

He sees Sliverbolt flying in to join the battle, "a flying wolf now 
I've seen everything." he thought as the new bot entered the sceen.

Lunarpine raised his pulse rifle, set it on EMP and fired toward 
Rush. 

He looked up to Shadow Wing, smiled and called out "Stay low Wing, I 
hope We're not going to take turns putting each other in the CR 
chamber." Looking around the battle field he saw all the Maximals 
fighting for thier existence and it made him proud to be among them.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jason Lind" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:
> Sliverbolt
